title: Dynamic Equilibrium with Insider Information and General Uninformed Agent Utility
abstract: arXiv:2211.15573v3 Announce Type: replace  Abstract: We study a continuous time economy where agents have asymmetric information. The informed agent (``$I$''), at time zero, receives a private signal about the risky assets' terminal payoff $\Psi(X_T)$, while the uninformed agent (``$U$'') has no private signal. $\Psi$ is an arbitrary payoff function, and $X$ follows a time-homogeneous diffusion. Crucially, we allow $U$ to have von Neumann-Morgenstern preferences with a general utility function on $(0,\infty)$ satisfying the standard conditions. This extends previous constructions of equilibria with asymmetric information used when all agents have exponential utilities and enables us to study the impact of $U$'s initial share endowment on equilibrium. To allow for $U$ to have general preferences, we introduce a new method to prove existence of a partial communication equilibrium (PCE), where at time $0$, $U$ receives a less-informative signal than $I$. translated_title: 具有内幕信息和一般未知代理的动态均衡
translated_abstract: 我们研究了一个连续时间经济系统，其中代理有不对称信息。知情代理（"$I$"）在时间零时获得关于风险资产终期收益$\Psi(X_T)$的私人信号，而未知情报的代理（"$U$"）没有私人信号。这扩展了先前在所有代理具有指数效用时使用的不对称信息均衡构造，并使我们能够研究$U$的初始份额禀赋对均衡的影响。为了允许$U$拥有一般偏好，我们引入了一种新方法来证明部分通信均衡（PCE）的存在，在时间$0$，$U$接收的信号比$I$少信息。
tldr: 该论文研究了具有内幕信息和一般未知代理的动态均衡，在引入一般偏好的基础上，提出了一种新方法来证明部分通信均衡（PCE）的存在。
en_tdlr: This paper examines dynamic equilibrium with insider information and general uninformed agents, introduces a new method to prove the existence of a partial communication equilibrium (PCE) with general preferences, and explores the impact of uninformed agents' initial endowment on equilibrium.
